message.name: ERR_HEARING_NOT_SCHEDULED
message.locale: Can only delete user attendee for a scheduled hearing.

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_INSUFFICIENT_USERS
message.locale: Cannot remove user attendee as there are an insufficient number of users scheduled to officiate at the hearing.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_INSUFFICIENT_USERS
message.locale: Cannot modify user attendee as there are an insufficient number of users scheduled to officiate at the hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_NOT_HELD
message.locale: The attendance cannot be updated until the hearing has been held.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_ATTENDANCE
message.locale: The attendance value is invalid as the hearing has been held.

message.name: ERR_NO_ROLE_TYPE
message.locale: A role type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ROLE_EXISTS
message.locale: The user is already invited to the hearing in the type of role specified.

message.name: ERR_USER_REMOVED
message.locale: The user has already been removed from the hearing.

message.name: INF_INVITE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: You have been invited to attend this hearing

message.name: INF_REMOVE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: You have been removed from this hearing.
